Line 92: Line 92:
===News & Current Affairs===
===News & Current Affairs===
{{Further|[[ABC News and Current Affairs]], [[ABC News (Australia)|ABC News]]}}
{{Further|[[ABC News and Current Affairs]], [[ABC News (Australia)|ABC News]]}}
â
[[Image:ABCANNews.jpg|250px|right|thumb|''ABC Asia Pacific News'' with Anne Kruger.]]
+
Three news bulletins are shown at two hour intervals throughout the evening, in order to provide a fairly constant timeslot for the range of timezones within the channel's coverage area. ''ABC Asia Pacific News'' is presented from the ABC's Southbank studios in Melbourne by [[Beverley O'Connor]], with stories from ABC reporters based in and around the region. Following the channel's relaunch in 2006, four new correspondents based in New Delhi, Beijing, the South Pacific and [[Jakarta]] were added to report exclusively for the bulletins.<ref name="programming" />
